fields.text: Welcome to 8tracks in San Francisco, the best place to make and discover playlists.
For help creating a new playlist, press [INDEX].
To choose a theme or mood for your playlist, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you with a playlist theming specialist.
To upload your own tracks to a playlist, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you with our upload team.
Please hold while we connect you with our trending playlists team.
Please hold while we connect you with our recommendations team.
